import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{ToastContainer,toast}from"react-toastify";import"react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css";import DeveloperForm from"./components/DeveloperForm";import DeveloperList from"./components/DeveloperList";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[developers,setDevelopers]=useState([]);const[filter,setFilter]=useState("");const API_URL="https://talrn-frontend-production.up.railway.app";// your live backend URL
